alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 6:11AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwest Santa Barbara County through 645 AM PST... At 608 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms across southwestern Santa Barbara County. The line was moving east northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lompoc... Point Conception... Vandenberg Air Force Base... Highway 101 through Gaviota State Park... Los Alamos... Buellton... Vandenberg Village... and Mission Hills. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast
